mapper.select: SELECT fUuid AS 'uuid', fCustomerUuid AS 'customerUuid', fPlanChargeAmount AS 'planChargeAmount', fActualChargeAmount AS 'actualChargeAmount', fCashier AS 'cashier', fUpdateTime AS 'updateTime', fCreateTime AS 'createTime' FROM t_customer_charge_log WHERE fCustomerUuid = #{customerUuid}
